H0.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Painkiller

H1.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Pain Reliever

H2.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Opiate

H3.text: An analgesic drug is commonly called a. Algesic

A4.text: An analgesic drug is also called a pain reliever

A5.text: An analgesic drug is also called a painkiller

A6.text: An analgesic drug is also called an antalgic

A7.text: Opiates with opioid activity are mainly used for pain management
